children.name: Windows 10
children.description: A very popular and user friendly operating system. Able to run nearly any task you want

children.name: Ubuntu Desktop
children.description: A great starting operating system for people starting with linux. Runs with the full linux kernel with a friendly user interface

children.name: Ubuntu Server
children.description: A good linux distro for running servers on. Comes with all the features of Ubuntu but is more barebones and only contains a command line interface

children.name: Raspberry PI OS
children.description: The operating system required to run a Raspberry Pi. Has lots of different options including those with an interface and those without

children.name: Chrome
children.description: A versatile and useful browser for everyday browsing. Also contains tools for developing websites and analyzing web code

children.name: Firefox
children.description: A fast and secure browser that just focuses on lightning fast web browsing. Great for those who want a secure and fast experience

children.name: Opera
children.description: A browser focused on the end user expeirence. Includes tools like a built-in VPN, integrate messaging, and a expansive customisation system

children.name: Gimp
children.description: A free photo editing software alternative to Photoshop. Covers most of the basic features you will need

children.name: VLC
children.description: Video Lan Client is an easy way to access media over a network. Allowing you to watch videos and photos across LAN

children.name: Audacity
children.description: A free and open source audio editor. Makes it really easy to tweak audio files as needed.

children.name: 7-zip
children.description: A very popular and free program for compression. Easily create zip files and archives

children.name: WinRAR
children.description: A fast and easy to use program to compress files and make archives

children.name: Notepad++
children.description: A free text editor that interprets many languages and makes it easy to quickly edit text files

children.name: Open Office
children.description: A free to use application to create lots of different documents like spreadsheets and word documents

children.name: FileZilla
children.description: An easy to use application to manage files over a network. Supports protocols like FTP and SFTP and includes easy to setup authentication

children.name: CCleaner
children.description: An application to quickly and easily cleanup your computer of unwanted and unnecessary files

children.name: Adobe Acrobat
children.description: A free program to easily view, comment, and print PDF documents. Also has a pro version which allows you to edit them

children.name: Advast Antivirus
children.description: A free antivirus to keep you protected from threats and malicious activity. Includes VPNs and strong privacy

children.name: Malwarebytes
children.description: A great antivirus to protect computers on a network. Includes plans for protection on a range of devices to keep you protected no matter what device you use

children.name: Team Viewer
children.description: A free program to offer remote support. Allows remote connection to other computers to help set up things and screen share
